0.body: A Solidity library for tracking and managing the decay of voting power in governance systems.
0.title: Voting Decay Smart Contract

1.body: Overview Features Installation Usage API Reference Testing Contributing License
1.title: Table of Contents

10.body: This project is licensed under the MIT License. This markdown block includes everything from the API Reference section to the end of the README. You can now easily copy and paste this into your project's README file.
10.title: License

11.body: Git Source Interface for managing voting power decay in a governance system This interface defines the core functionality for a voting decay management system
11.title: IVotingDecayManager

13.body: Returns the current decay-free window duration function decayFreeWindow() external view returns (uint40); Returns Name Type Description <none> uint40 The decay-free window duration in seconds
13.title: decayFreeWindow

14.body: Returns the current decay rate per second function decayRatePerSecond() external view returns (uint256); Returns Name Type Description <none> uint256 The decay rate per second
14.title: decayRatePerSecond

15.body: Returns the current decay function type function decayFunction() external view returns (VotingDecayLibrary.DecayFunction); Returns Name Type Description <none> VotingDecayLibrary.DecayFunction The current decay function (Linear or Exponential)
15.title: decayFunction

16.body: Calculates the current voting power for an account This function applies the decay factor to the original voting power function getVotingPower(address accountAddress, uint256 originalValue) external view returns (uint256); Parameters Name Type Description accountAddress address The address of the account to calculate voting power for originalValue uint256 The original voting power value before decay Returns Name Type Description <none> uint256 The current voting power after applying decay
16.title: getVotingPower

18.body: Emitted when an account's decay factor is updated event DecayUpdated(address indexed account, uint256 newRetentionFactor); Parameters Name Type Description account address The address of the account whose decay factor was updated newRetentionFactor uint256 The new retention factor after the update
18.title: DecayUpdated

19.body: Emitted when the global decay rate is changed event DecayRateSet(uint256 newRate); Parameters Name Type Description newRate uint256 The new decay rate
19.title: DecayRateSet

2.body: The Voting Decay Library provides a flexible and efficient way to implement voting power erosion in blockchain-based governance systems. It allows for customizable decay rates, supports delegation, and offers utilities for calculating and updating voting power based on user activity.
2.title: Overview

20.body: Emitted when an account's decay is reset to its initial state event DecayReset(address indexed account); Parameters Name Type Description account address The address of the account whose decay was reset
20.title: DecayReset

21.body: Emitted when the decay-free window duration is changed event DecayFreeWindowSet(uint256 window); Parameters Name Type Description window uint256 The new duration of the decay-free window
21.title: DecayFreeWindowSet

22.body: Emitted when the decay function type is changed event DecayFunctionSet(uint8 newFunction); Parameters Name Type Description newFunction uint8 The new decay function type (0 for Linear, 1 for Exponential)
22.title: DecayFunctionSet

24.body: Thrown when an invalid decay rate is set error InvalidDecayRate();
24.title: InvalidDecayRate

25.body: Thrown when trying to delegate voting power that's already delegated error AlreadyDelegated();
25.title: AlreadyDelegated

26.body: Thrown when attempting to delegate voting power to oneself error CannotDelegateToSelf();
26.title: CannotDelegateToSelf

27.body: Thrown when trying to undelegate voting power that isn't delegated error NotDelegated();
27.title: NotDelegated

28.body: Thrown when an unauthorized address attempts to reset decay error NotAuthorizedToReset();
28.title: NotAuthorizedToReset

29.body: Thrown when trying to perform an operation on an uninitialized account error AccountNotInitialized();
29.title: AccountNotInitialized

3.body: Customizable decay rates Notional amount-based erosion calculation Support for delegated voting power Time-based modifiers for accurate decay tracking Erosion reset mechanisms Flexible voting power decay policies Easy integration with existing governance systems
3.title: Features

) internal pure returns (uint256);

39.title: InvalidDecayType

4.body: TODO: Actually publish as foundry package To install the Voting Decay Library, use the following command: forge install yourusername/voting-decay
4.title: Installation

struct DecayInfo { uint256 decayFactor; uint40 lastUpdateTimestamp;
}
41.title: DecayInfo

44.body: Git Source Inherits: IVotingDecayManager , Ownable Manages voting power decay for accounts in a governance system Implements decay calculations, delegation, and administrative functions
44.title: VotingDecayManager

46.body: mapping(address account => VotingDecayLibrary.DecayInfo info) internal decayInfoByAccount;
46.title: decayInfoByAccount

5.body:
Here's a basic example of how to use the Voting Decay Library: pragma solidity ^0.8.0; import "voting-decay/VotingDecay.sol"; contract MyGovernance { using VotingDecay for VotingDecay.Account; mapping(address => VotingDecay.Account) public accounts; function vote(uint256 proposalId) external { VotingDecay.Account storage account = accounts[msg.sender]; account.updateDecay(); uint256 votingPower = account.getCurrentVotingPower(); // Use votingPower for voting logic } function refresh() external { accounts[msg.sender].refreshDecay(); }
}
5.title: Usage

51.body:
Constructor to initialize the VotingDecayManager constructor( uint40 decayFreeWindow_, uint256 decayRatePerSecond_, VotingDecayLibrary.DecayFunction decayFunction_
) Ownable(msg.sender); Parameters Name Type Description decayFreeWindow_ uint40 Initial decay-free window duration decayRatePerSecond_ uint256 Initial decay rate per second decayFunction_ VotingDecayLibrary.DecayFunction Initial decay function type
51.title: constructor

52.body: Sets a new decay rate per second function setDecayRatePerSecond(uint256 newRatePerSecond) external onlyOwner; Parameters Name Type Description newRatePerSecond uint256 New decay rate (in WAD format)
52.title: setDecayRatePerSecond

53.body: Sets a new decay-free window duration function setDecayFreeWindow(uint40 newWindow) external onlyOwner; Parameters Name Type Description newWindow uint40 New decay-free window duration in seconds
53.title: setDecayFreeWindow

54.body: Sets a new decay function type function setDecayFunction(VotingDecayLibrary.DecayFunction newFunction) external onlyOwner; Parameters Name Type Description newFunction VotingDecayLibrary.DecayFunction New decay function (Linear or Exponential)
54.title: setDecayFunction

55.body: Calculates the current voting power for an account function getVotingPower(address accountAddress, uint256 originalValue) public view returns (uint256); Parameters Name Type Description accountAddress address Address to calculate voting power for originalValue uint256 Original voting power value Returns Name Type Description <none> uint256 Current voting power after applying decay
55.title: getVotingPower

56.body: Calculates the decay factor for an account function getDecayFactor(address accountAddress) public view returns (uint256); Parameters Name Type Description accountAddress address Address to calculate retention factor for Returns Name Type Description <none> uint256 Current retention factor
56.title: getDecayFactor

57.body: Gets the decay information for an account function getDecayInfo(address accountAddress) public view returns (VotingDecayLibrary.DecayInfo memory); Parameters Name Type Description accountAddress address Address to get decay info for Returns Name Type Description <none> VotingDecayLibrary.DecayInfo DecayInfo struct containing decay information
57.title: getDecayInfo

58.body: Internal function to initialize an account if it's new function _initializeAccountIfNew(address accountAddress) internal; Parameters Name Type Description accountAddress address Address of the account to initialize
58.title: _initializeAccountIfNew

59.body: Internal function to check if an account has decay info function _hasDecayInfo(address accountAddress) internal view returns (bool); Parameters Name Type Description accountAddress address Address of the account to check Returns Name Type Description <none> bool bool indicating whether the account has decay info
59.title: _hasDecayInfo

60.body: Internal function to update the decay factor for an account function _updateDecayFactor(address accountAddress) internal; Parameters Name Type Description accountAddress address Address of the account to update
60.title: _updateDecayFactor

61.body: Internal function to reset the decay for an account function _resetDecay(address accountAddress) internal; Parameters Name Type Description accountAddress address Address of the account to reset
61.title: _resetDecay

62.body: Internal function to get the delegate address for an account function _getDelegateTo(address accountAddress) internal view virtual returns (address); Parameters Name Type Description accountAddress address Address of the account to get the delegate for Returns Name Type Description <none> address Address of the delegate
62.title: _getDelegateTo

67.body: Multiplies two numbers and divides the result by a third number, using PRBMath for precision. function mulDiv(uint256 a, uint256 b, uint256 denominator) internal pure returns (uint256); Parameters Name Type Description a uint256 The first number to multiply b uint256 The second number to multiply denominator uint256 The number to divide by Returns Name Type Description <none> uint256 The result of (a * b) / denominator, using PRBMath's UD60x18 type
67.title: mulDiv

68.body:
Calculates the exponential decay using PRBMath's UD60x18 type. function exponentialDecay( uint256 initialValue, uint256 decayRatePerSecond, uint256 decayTimeInSeconds
) internal pure returns (uint256); Parameters Name Type Description initialValue uint256 The initial value decayRatePerSecond uint256 The decay rate per second decayTimeInSeconds uint256 The time elapsed in seconds Returns Name Type Description <none> uint256 The decayed value
68.title: exponentialDecay

69.body:
Calculates the linear decay. function linearDecay( uint256 initialValue, uint256 decayRatePerSecond, uint256 decayTimeInSeconds
) internal pure returns (uint256); Parameters Name Type Description initialValue uint256 The initial value decayRatePerSecond uint256 The decay rate per second decayTimeInSeconds uint256 The time elapsed in seconds Returns Name Type Description <none> uint256 The decayed value
69.title: linearDecay

7.body: calculateDecay(uint256 notionalAmount, uint256 elapsedTime) -> uint256 getCurrentVotingPower(address account) -> uint256 updateDecay(address account) resetDecay(address account) applyDecay(address account) setDecayRate(uint256 rate) refreshDecay(address account) For detailed documentation on each function, please refer to the inline comments in the source code.
